definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:nuke</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">TNT</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Nuke</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Nuke</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
